channel.title: Haveing problems with other people connecting
channel.description:
I have everything set right and my server completely coded and final. But when my co-owner trys to get on the server it says its offline
Router: 2wire 2700 hg-b
I have dmzplus mode enabled that allows all ports and applications though to my server computer.
Please help me i want to get this server up and running. whoever helps can get donator on my server.

item.title: Haveing problems with other people connecting
item.dc:creator: @New_Era1 New_Era
item.description:
@New_Era1 wrote:

I did and it still doesnt work

Read full topic
item.source: Haveing problems with other people connecting

item.title: Haveing problems with other people connecting
item.dc:creator: @farcastdreams farcastdreams
item.description:
@farcastdreams wrote:

Check if you have:

  1. Put the Server on
  2. Turned off firewall
  3. Made outgoing and incoming connection come through.
  4. The port is being portforwarded.

Read full topic
item.source: Haveing problems with other people connecting
